sqlMap.insert:
insert into gt_orderinfo
order_id, dealer_id, merchant_order_id,
ticket_num
order_status
merchant_id
order_level
out_ticket_type
order_name
pay_money
pay_money_show
ticket_pay_money
bx_pay_money
,create_time
train_no
from_station
arrive_station
from_time
arrive_time
travel_time
seat_type
ext_seat
sms_notify
link_name
link_phone
order_result_url
pay_result_url
order_pro1
order_pro2
order_type
reqtoken
isChooseSeats
chooseSeats
)
values
#order_id:VARCHAR#, #agent_id:VARCHAR#, #merchant_order_id:VARCHAR#,
#ticket_num:INTEGER#
#order_status:VARCHAR#
#merchant_id:VARCHAR#
#order_level:VARCHAR#
'11'
#order_name:VARCHAR#
#pay_money:DECIMAL#
#pay_money_show:DECIMAL#
#ticket_pay_money:DECIMAL#
#bx_pay_money:DECIMAL#
,NOW()
#train_no:VARCHAR#
#from_station:VARCHAR#
#arrive_station:VARCHAR#
#from_time:VARCHAR#
#arrive_time:VARCHAR#
STR_TO_DATE(#travel_time:VARCHAR#,'%Y-%m-%d')

#ext_seat:VARCHAR#
#sms_notify:VARCHAR#
#link_name:VARCHAR#
#link_phone:VARCHAR#

#pay_result_url:VARCHAR#
#order_pro1:VARCHAR#
#order_pro2:VARCHAR#
#order_type:VARCHAR#
#reqtoken:VARCHAR#
#isChooseSeats:TINYINT#
#chooseSeats:VARCHAR#
)

cp_id,
order_id
user_name
ticket_type

seat_type
)

#telephone:VARCHAR#
,NOW()

)

order_id

from_name

,create_time

)

sqlMap.select: SELECT hc.dealer_id as agent_id,hc.order_id,hc.order_status,hc.order_level,hc.train_no,hc.from_station, hc.arrive_station,hc.from_time,hc.arrive_time,DATE_FORMAT(hc.travel_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS travel_time, hc.out_ticket_billno,DATE_FORMAT(hc.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS pay_time,hc.seat_type, hc.pay_money_show,DATE_FORMAT(hc.out_ticket_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS out_ticket_time, hc.ticket_pay_money,hc.bx_pay_money,eop_refund_url,nopwd_pay_url,eop_order_id,hc.pay_money, hc.out_ticket_type,hc.sms_notify,hc.link_name,hc.link_phone,hc.buy_money,hc.eop_pay_number, hc.can_refund,hc.ext_seat,hc.merchant_id,hc.merchant_order_id,order_result_url,send_notify_url, order_type,reqtoken,fail_reason FROM gt_orderinfo hc WHERE hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT hc.dealer_id as agent_id,hc.order_id,hc.order_status,hc.order_level,hc.train_no,hc.from_station, hc.arrive_station,hc.from_time,hc.arrive_time,DATE_FORMAT(hc.travel_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS travel_time, hc.out_ticket_billno,DATE_FORMAT(hc.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS pay_time,hc.seat_type, hc.pay_money_show,DATE_FORMAT(hc.out_ticket_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS out_ticket_time, hc.ticket_pay_money,hc.bx_pay_money,eop_refund_url,eop_order_id,nopwd_pay_url,hc.pay_money, hc.out_ticket_type,hc.sms_notify,hc.link_name,hc.link_phone,hc.buy_money,hc.eop_pay_number, hc.can_refund,hc.ext_seat,hc.merchant_id,hc.merchant_order_id,order_result_url,send_notify_url FROM gt_orderinfo hc WHERE hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
hc.merchant_order_id=#merchant_order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT hc.order_id FROM gt_orderinfo hc
hc.merchant_order_id=#merchant_order_id:VARCHAR#
hc.merchant_id=#merchant_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT hc.from_station,hc.arrive_station,DATE_FORMAT(hc.travel_time,'%m月%d日') AS travel_time,hc.from_time,hc.train_no, hc.link_name,hc.link_phone FROM gt_orderinfo hc WHERE hc.order_id=#orderId:VARCHAR#
SELECT cp.train_box,cp.seat_no,cp.user_name FROM gt_orderinfo_cp cp WHERE cp.order_id=#orderId:VARCHAR#

SELECT cp.order_id,cp.cp_id,cp.seat_type,cp.pay_money AS cp_pay_money,CONVERT(cp.buy_money,CHAR) AS cp_buy_money,cp.train_box,cp.seat_no, CONVERT(cp.ticket_type,CHAR) AS ticket_type,cp.user_name,CONVERT(cp.ids_type,CHAR) AS ids_type,cp.user_ids, bx.bx_id,bx.bx_billno,bx.bx_code,bx.pay_money AS bx_pay_money,p.product_id,p.name AS bx_name FROM gt_orderinfo_cp cp LEFT JOIN cp_orderinfo_bx bx ON cp.order_id=bx.order_id AND cp.cp_id=bx.cp_id LEFT JOIN ext_productinfo p ON bx.product_id=p.product_id WHERE cp.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT hc.order_id, hc.order_status, hc.from_station, hc.arrive_station, DATE_FORMAT(hc.travel_time,'%Y-%m-%d') travel_time, hc.from_time,hc.arrive_time, hc.seat_type,hc.train_no,hc.order_level, hc.ticket_pay_money, hc.bx_pay_money, hc.pay_money, DATE_FORMAT(hc.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS pay_time, DATE_FORMAT(hc.out_ticket_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS out_ticket_time, DATE_FORMAT(hc.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, CONVERT(hc.out_ticket_type,CHAR) AS out_ticket_type, NOW()>DATE_ADD(hc.from_time, INTERVAL 12 HOUR) AS is_deadline, IFNULL(hc.refund_deadline_ignore,'0') AS deadline_ignore,hc.can_refund,hc.refund_status FROM gt_orderinfo hc WHERE hc.order_status <> '00'
hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
hc.merchant_order_id=#merchant_order_id:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY hc.create_time DESC LIMIT #everyPagefrom:Integer#, #pageSize:Integer#
SELECT order_id,user_name,ticket_type,ids_type,user_ids FROM gt_orderinfo_cp WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gt_orderinfo hc WHERE 1=1
hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
hc.merchant_order_id=#merchant_order_id:VARCHAR#
hc.merchant_id=#merchant_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE gt_orderinfo set order_status='55' WHERE order_id=#orderid:VARCHAR#

UPDATE gt_orderinfo SET order_status=#order_status:VARCHAR# WHERE order_id=#asp_order_id:VARCHAR#
order_status=#old_status:VARCHAR#

UPDATE gt_orderinfo SET
order_status=#order_status:VARCHAR#,
eop_order_id=#eop_order_id:VARCHAR#,
eop_pay_number=#eop_pay_number:VARCHAR#,
eop_refund_url=#eop_refund_url:VARCHAR#,
send_notify_url=#send_notify_url:VARCHAR#,
nopwd_pay_url=#nopwd_pay_url:VARCHAR#,
pay_money=#pay_money:DECIMAL#,
pay_time=now(), order_pro1 = '' WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT hc.order_id, hc.order_name, CONVERT(hc.ticket_pay_money,CHAR) AS ticket_pay_money, CONVERT(hc.bx_pay_money, CHAR) AS bx_pay_money, hc.from_station, hc.arrive_station, hc.from_time,hc.arrive_time, DATE_FORMAT(hc.travel_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as travel_time ,hc.train_no,CONVERT(hc.seat_type,CHAR) as seat_type,CONVERT(hc.out_ticket_type,CHAR) as out_ticket_type,hc.ext_seat,hc.order_level,hc.merchant_id ,CONVERT(hc.isChooseSeats,CHAR) as isChooseSeats, hc.chooseSeats FROM gt_orderinfo hc WHERE (hc.order_status='11' OR hc.order_status='12') AND hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT cp.cp_id,cp.order_id,cp.user_name,CONVERT(cp.ticket_type,CHAR) as ticket_type, CONVERT(cp.ids_type,CHAR) as ids_type,cp.user_ids,CONVERT(cp.seat_type,CHAR) as seat_type, CONVERT(cp.pay_money,CHAR) as pay_money,train_box,seat_no,CONVERT(cp.buy_money,CHAR) as buy_money FROM gt_orderinfo_cp cp WHERE cp.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE cp_orderinfo_bx b SET b.bx_status=0 WHERE b.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CONVERT(ticket_pay_money-buy_money,CHAR) AS refund_money, order_id, CONVERT(IFNULL(refund_total,0),CHAR) AS refund_total FROM gt_orderinfo WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# AND order_status='44' AND ticket_pay_money-buy_money>0
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE gt_orderinfo hc SET hc.refund_total=#refund_total:VARCHAR#
hc.can_refund=#can_refund:VARCHAR#
WHERE hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT rs.order_id,rs.cp_id,rs.refund_type,rs.refund_status, CONVERT(refund_money, CHAR) as refund_money,rs.our_remark,rs.user_remark, DATE_FORMAT(rs.refund_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS refund_time FROM gt_orderinfo_refundstream rs WHERE rs.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# ORDER BY rs.refund_type, rs.create_time DESC
sqlMap.insert:
insert into cp_orderinfo_bxfp
order_id
fp_receiver
fp_phone
fp_zip_code
fp_address
,create_time )
values
#order_id:VARCHAR#
#fp_receiver:VARCHAR#
#fp_phone:VARCHAR#
#fp_zip_code:VARCHAR#
#fp_address:VARCHAR#
,NOW() )
sqlMap.select: SELECT cp_id FROM gt_orderinfo_cp WHERE order_id = #order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT cp_id FROM gt_orderinfo_cp WHERE order_id = #order_id:VARCHAR# AND ids_type=#id_type:INTEGER# AND user_ids = #user_ids:VARCHAR# AND ticket_type = #ticket_type:INTEGER# AND user_name = #user_name:VARCHAR# AND cp_id = #cp_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT order_status FROM gt_orderinfo WHERE order_id = #order_id:VARCHAR#
merchant_id = #merchant_id:VARCHAR#
merchant_order_id = #merchant_order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT order_status FROM cp_orderinfo WHERE order_id = #order_id:VARCHAR#
channel = #merchant_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE gt_orderinfo set order_status=#order_status:VARCHAR# WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
merchant_id = #merchant_id:VARCHAR#
merchant_order_id = #merchant_order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cp_orderinfo_bx WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# AND ids_type=#ids_type:VARCHAR# AND user_ids=#user_ids:VARCHAR#

SELECT bx_code,CONVERT(pay_money,CHAR) pay_money,bx_channel FROM cp_orderinfo_bx WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# AND ids_type=#ids_type:VARCHAR# AND user_ids=#user_ids:VARCHAR# AND cp_id=#cp_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT ext.order_id,ext.eop_order_id,ext.merchant_id,ext.send_notify_url FROM gt_orderinfo ext WHERE ext.order_status='11' AND ext.create_time > DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) ORDER BY ext.create_time DESC LIMIT 0, 20

SELECT em.merchant_id,em.sign_key,em.merchant_name,em.merchant_version,em.merchant_terminal FROM ext_merchantinfo em LEFT JOIN gt_orderinfo eo ON em.merchant_id = eo.merchant_id WHERE eo.order_id = #order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE gt_orderinfo set pay_fail_reason=#pay_fail_reason:VARCHAR# WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
merchant_id = #merchant_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT sms_channel FROM ext_merchantinfo WHERE merchant_id = (SELECT merchant_id FROM gt_orderinfo WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#)
SELECT cp_id FROM gt_orderinfo_refundstream WHERE order_id = #order_id:VARCHAR#

select bx_id,order_id,cp_id,from_name,to_name,ids_type,user_name,user_ids,bx_code,pay_money,train_no,bx_status from cp_orderinfo_bx where order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# and order_channel=#order_channel:VARCHAR# and merchant_id=#merchant_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: update gt_orderinfo_refundstream set refund_status='00' where cp_id=#cp_id:VARCHAR# and order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# and refund_status='22' and (refund_type = '1' or refund_type='3')
sqlMap.select: select refund_seq from gt_orderinfo_refundstream where cp_id=#cp_id:VARCHAR# and order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# and (refund_type = '1' or refund_type='3')
sqlMap.insert:
insert into gt_orderinfo_history
order_id,
cp_id,
order_optlog,
opter,
create_time )
values
#order_id:VARCHAR# ,
#cp_id:VARCHAR# ,
#order_optlog:VARCHAR# ,
#opter:VARCHAR# ,
now() )
sqlMap.select: select fee_type,CONVERT(order_fee,CHAR) order_fee,CONVERT(ticket_fee,CHAR) ticket_fee, CONVERT(echelon_zeo,CHAR) echelon_zeo,echelon_fir,echelon_sec, CONVERT(percent_fee,CHAR) percent_fee from ext_fee_model where merchant_id=#merchant_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: update ext_merchantinfo set ticket_num=ticket_num+1 where merchant_id= (select merchant_id from gt_orderinfo where order_id = #order_id:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.select: select order_id from gt_orderinfo where eop_order_id=#eop_order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: update gt_orderinfo_refundnotify set notify_num=5 ,notify_time = NOW() where notify_num=10 AND notify_status = '22' AND order_id = #order_id:VARCHAR# and cp_id=#cp_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select CONVERT(count(1),CHAR) num, CONVERT(SUM(buy_money),CHAR) buy_money from gt_orderinfo_cp where order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# group by order_id
sqlMap.insert:
insert into gt_orderinfo_booknotify
order_id
merchant_id
,create_time
notify_url
)
values
#order_id:VARCHAR#
#merchant_id:VARCHAR#
,NOW()
#notify_url:VARCHAR#
)
sqlMap.update: update gt_orderinfo set pay_money = #pay_money:DECIMAL# , out_ticket_time = now(), pay_money_show = #pay_money:DECIMAL#, ticket_pay_money=#ticket_pay_money:DECIMAL# where order_id = #order_id:VARCHAR#
update gt_orderinfo set out_ticket_time = now() where order_id = #order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT a.acc_username, a.acc_password ,a.acc_id FROM cp_accountinfo a LEFT JOIN cp_orderinfo cp ON a.acc_id=cp.account_id WHERE cp.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#

SELECT CONVERT(rs.stream_id,CHAR) AS stream_id,rs.order_id,rs.cp_id, rs.refund_type,rs.refund_seq,rs.user_remark,rs.refund_percent, CONVERT(rs.refund_money, CHAR) AS refund_money FROM gt_orderinfo_refundstream rs WHERE (rs.refund_type='1' or rs.refund_type='3') AND rs.refund_status='00' ORDER BY rs.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,5

SELECT hc.order_id, hc.train_no, hc.from_station from_city, hc.arrive_station to_city, CONCAT(CONVERT(DATE_FORMAT(hc.travel_time,'%Y-%m-%d'), CHAR),' ', hc.from_time, ':00') from_time, CONVERT(DATE_FORMAT(hc.travel_time,'%Y-%m-%d'), CHAR) travel_time, hc.out_ticket_billno, CONVERT(DATE_FORMAT(hc.out_ticket_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), CHAR) out_ticket_time, cp.cp_id, CONVERT(cp.buy_money, CHAR) buy_money, hc.merchant_id channel, cp.user_name, CONVERT(cp.ticket_type, CHAR) ticket_type, CONVERT(cp.ids_type, CHAR)ids_type, cp.user_ids, CONVERT(cp.seat_type, CHAR) seat_type, cp.train_box, cp.seat_no FROM gt_orderinfo hc LEFT JOIN gt_orderinfo_cp cp ON hc.order_id=cp.order_id WHERE hc.order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# and cp.cp_id=#cp_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE gt_orderinfo_cp SET alter_money=#alter_tickets_money# WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# and cp_id=#cp_id:VARCHAR#

UPDATE gt_orderinfo_cp SET refund_status=#refund_status:VARCHAR#
refund_fail_reason=#refuse_reason#
WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# and cp_id=#cp_id:VARCHAR#

UPDATE gt_orderinfo_refundstream SET refund_status=#refund_status:VARCHAR#, refund_plan_time = NOW() , verify_time = NOW()
refund_time=NOW()
refund_money=#refund_money:DECIMAL#
actual_refund_money=#actual_refund_money:DECIMAL#
alter_tickets_money=#alter_tickets_money:DECIMAL#
refund_money=#refund_money:DECIMAL#
refund_12306_seq=#refund_12306_seq:VARCHAR#
our_remark=#our_remark:VARCHAR#
WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# and cp_id=#cp_id:VARCHAR#
refund_type = #refund_type:VARCHAR#

UPDATE gt_orderinfo_refundstream SET refund_status=#order_status:VARCHAR# WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR# and cp_id=#cp_id:VARCHAR#
refund_type = #refund_type:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(order_id) FROM gt_orderinfo_refundstream WHERE refund_seq=#refund_seq# and refund_status='00'
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE gt_orderinfo_refundnotify hm
hm.notify_status='11', notify_time=now()
WHERE hm.order_id=#order_id# and hm.refund_seq=#refund_seq#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(order_optlog) FROM gt_orderinfo_history WHERE order_optlog LIKE '%eop通知支付成功%' AND order_id = #orderId#
select cp_id,order_id,user_name,ticket_type,ids_type,user_ids,telephone,create_time, pay_money,buy_money,seat_type,seat_no,train_box from gt_orderinfo_cp where cp_id=#cpId:VARCHAR#
SELECT order_optlog from cp_orderinfo_history t where t.order_id=#orderId:VARCHAR# and t.order_optlog like #content:VARCHAR# limit 1
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE gt_orderinfo
reqtoken=#reqtoken:VARCHAR#
WHERE order_id = #order_id:VARCHAR#

UPDATE gt_orderinfo
order_result_url=#order_result_url:VARCHAR#
WHERE order_id = #order_id:VARCHAR#

UPDATE gt_orderinfo
fail_reason=#fail_reason:VARCHAR#
WHERE order_id = #order_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM gt_orderinfo_eopandpaynotify WHERE order_id=#order_id:VARCHAR#
SELECT sub_outTicket_billno FROM cp_orderinfo_cp WHERE cp_id = #cp_id:VARCHAR# AND order_id =#order_id:VARCHAR# limit 1
